SELECT A .GUARAN_TYPE, A .GUARAN_PORT_TYPE, CASE A .GUARAN_PORT_TYPE WHEN '1' THEN '可明确划分份额' WHEN '2' THEN '不可明确划分份额' END GUARAN_PORT_NAME, A .CLEAR_RATIO, A .CLEAR_RATIO_AMT, A .NOT_CLEAR_AMT, C.NAME_ FROM BIZ_GUARANTEE_RESULT A INNER JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_INFO B ON A .GUARAN_TYPE = B.ID_ INNER JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE C ON B.TYPE_POINT = C.CODE_ AND C.TYPE_ = '004'
and A.GRANT_CODE = #{cm.grantCode}

SELECT A .GRANT_CODE, B.TYPE_POINT, C.SRV1, B.GUARANTOR_CUST_ID, B.GUARANTEE_CONTRACT_TYPE, B.WARRANTY_CONTRACT_NUMBER, B.GUARANTEE_AMOUNT, A .PLEDGE_TYPE, A .CLEAR_RATIO_AMT, A .NOT_CLEAR_AMT FROM BIZ_GUARANTEE_RESULT A LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_INFO B ON A .GUARAN_TYPE = B.ID_ LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE C ON A .PLEDGE_TYPE = C.CODE_ AND C.TYPE_ = '001'
and A.GRANT_CODE = #{cm.grantCode}

SELECT A .GRANT_CODE, C.SRV1, A.GUARANTOR_CUST_ID, A.WARRANTY_CONTRACT_NUMBER, A .PLEDGE_TYPE, A .CLEAR_RATIO_AMT, A .NOT_CLEAR_AMT, bdg.IDENT_NUMBER, A.change_num FROM BIZ_GUARANTEE_RESULT A LEFT JOIN BIZ_GUARANTEE_TYPE C ON A .PLEDGE_TYPE = C.CODE_ AND C.TYPE_ = '001' JOIN biz_debt_grant bdg ON A.GRANT_CODE = bdg.GRANT_CODE
AND (bdg.change_num = a.change_num or a.change_num = bdg.change_num -1)
and A.GRANT_CODE = #{cm.grantCode}
order by A.change_num DESC
